transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello ha ji mam.
Customer: Ha. Hello ha. Ha ha mam bataiye mam. Complaint kab resolve hoga. Aapne. 
Executive: Mam aapne iske regarding pura mail kar diya hai. Mail kar diya hai. 
Customer: Ha ha. 
Executive: Iske regarding mail kar diya na to 24 hours working day working hour me ho jata hai wo. 
Customer: To kal to Pallavi mam bhi phone kiya tha bola tha Haider sir se baat karke complaint close karwa denge par abhi tak bhi nahi hua. 
Executive: Mam 24 hours me aapka refund aa jayega na. 
Customer: Refund nahi aaya. Aapka complaint close hoga. 
Executive: Achcha aapka. 
Customer: Hello. Hello complaint close kab hoga ye mai puch rahi hu. 
Executive: 24 working jo har rahega uske andar ho jayega matlab ki one working day ke andar close ho jata hai. 
Customer: Thik hai mai 24 hours tak wait karti hu agar nahi hota hai to mai complaint kar dungi fir se. 
Executive: Thik hai ek aur aapki complaint aayi thi. 
Customer: Ha boliye. 
Executive: Mam ek aur aapki complaint aayi thi aisa karke dear sir you have cheated me aisa karke. 
Customer: Do complaint aaya hai. 
Executive: Hmm ye aapki complaint aapne ki hai na mam. 
Customer: Iske regarding aapne mail kar jo jo aapko jo jo aapne mam bataya tha wo sara aapne kar diya hai na mail wagera sara kar diya hai na. 
Executive: Ha. 
Executive: Ha to mail karne ke 24 hour lagte hai uske baad aapki complaint resolve ho jayegi. 
Customer: Aapka naam kya hai? 
Executive: Ha mam Rahil naam hai mera Rahil. 
Customer: Ha to Rahil sir aap bhi to mujhe mail kiya tha na aapko bhi maine kal bahut bar phone kiya try kiya par aapka phone hi nahi lag raha hai. 
Executive: Mam ye office wala phone hai 10 to six hi rehta hai matlab. Chaliye mai ab dekh leta hu mai aapka number mai save kar leta hu. 
Customer: Account manager bhi nahi hai mera account manager bar bar change ho raha hai ek bar Aniket sir ek bar phone kar raha hai ek bar Pallavi. 
Executive: Nahi nahi mai hi aapka account manager hu mam mai hi aapka account manager hu mai aapka number save kar leta hu thik hai. 
Customer: Ha. 
Executive: Aapka number save kar leta hu aur aapka call aayega to mai receive kar lunga mam. 
Customer: To Aniket sir account manager nahi hai. 
Executive: Nahi Aniket nahi hai aapka. Mai hi hu abhi aapka. 
Customer: Bola hai do din se. 
Executive: Mam wo dekh raha tha par abhi mai aapka ye wala jo aapka hai na issue thik hai. 
Customer: Ha. 
Executive: Abhi mai dekh raha hu thik hai. Aapne mail wagera kar diya usne jo jo bataya tha. 
Customer: Buyer se ek hi complaint aaya hai to sir ye mai puch rahi hu. 
Executive: Ek hi complaint aaya hai. 
Customer: Ek hi complaint aaya hai. 
Executive: Ha uske regarding hum log aapko mail kar diya hai ek bar mail check kar lijiyega aur 24 hours tak wait karte ho complaint resolve ho jayegi to. 
Customer: Okay yes yes yes mam ho jayegi ho jayegi. 
Customer: Thik hai thank you sir okay. 
Executive: Okay welcome mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Complaint resolution and refund delay.

- Account manager changing frequently.

- Enquired about the number of complaints received.



Resolution:

- Assured resolution within 24 working hours.

- Clarified Rahil is the current account manager.

- Advised to check the mail for complaint details.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will wait 24 hours for resolution.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, complaint, account manager, resolution
